about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Hyperborea ONLY UP: LIZARDS MUST FALL!

Russ is tired of being attacked and humiliated by lizards. For the glory of their ANCESTORS Russ went into another battle to once and for all be at the top of evolution, as well as to destroy the nasty lizards!

Gather a company of up to 8 people and punish these sneaky and treacherous lizards!

Only up, punish these Lizards!

Your sense of timing and accuracy will be crucial. Locations are designed to keep you in suspense, and every metre travelled will be a stern test for you and your Rus brothers.

Features:

  • Multiplayer: Compete against your Rus brothers. Worlds are designed for up to 8 players!

  • Interesting mechanics: you can push your brother Russ to keep him relaxed! Also, every time you push a Lizard into an abyss, you are spiritually attached to a point and can move there at any time!

  • Tactile controls: only your spirit and discipline will help you reach the end - perfectly balanced controls will allow you to triumph over the cursed Lizards

  • Graphics: you can fully experience the world of Hyperborea - your eyes will be delighted by the local beauty and locations!

  • Optimisation: even on the weakest PC you will be able to run and play our game.

  • Active communication with the community: the developers keep in touch with every Rus, because we are all brothers. We will help you with everything. Join our discord server.

Defeat the Lizards and become the hero of your people! Get on the leaderboards and everyone will know about you, even the lousy Lizards will be afraid of you.

© 2025. All copyrights reserved.
detailed_description:
WISHLIST NOW!


About the Game

Welcome to the world of Hyperborea ONLY UP: LIZARDS MUST FALL!

Russ is tired of being attacked and humiliated by lizards. For the glory of their ANCESTORS Russ went into another battle to once and for all be at the top of evolution, as well as to destroy the nasty lizards!

Gather a company of up to 8 people and punish these sneaky and treacherous lizards!

Only up, punish these Lizards!

Your sense of timing and accuracy will be crucial. Locations are designed to keep you in suspense, and every metre travelled will be a stern test for you and your Rus brothers.

Features:

  • Multiplayer: Compete against your Rus brothers. Worlds are designed for up to 8 players!

  • Interesting mechanics: you can push your brother Russ to keep him relaxed! Also, every time you push a Lizard into an abyss, you are spiritually attached to a point and can move there at any time!

  • Tactile controls: only your spirit and discipline will help you reach the end - perfectly balanced controls will allow you to triumph over the cursed Lizards

  • Graphics: you can fully experience the world of Hyperborea - your eyes will be delighted by the local beauty and locations!

  • Optimisation: even on the weakest PC you will be able to run and play our game.

  • Active communication with the community: the developers keep in touch with every Rus, because we are all brothers. We will help you with everything. Join our discord server.

Defeat the Lizards and become the hero of your people! Get on the leaderboards and everyone will know about you, even the lousy Lizards will be afraid of you.

© 2025. All copyrights reserved.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 1GB
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4GHz Quad-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 4GB
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Only Up: LIZARDS MUST FALL is an incredible multiplayer parkour game where precision and speed are important. Jump and climb over various obstacles. Defeat the cursed Lizards. The slightest mistake can result in falling to the starting location and your Rus brothers will stop respecting you.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, German, Japanese, French, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
